products.author: Beefeater 1.5L
products.quote: The Beefeater is an absolute classic and one of the most recognizable and typical gins on the market. It's a London Dry Gin that is very loved by Martini amateurs. The bottle and the taste are very recognizable and have been unchanged during the past years.

products.author: Belgin 13
products.quote: Belgin Ultra 13, a new Belgian gin, distilled according to old principles. The Belgin Ultra 13 has it's own personality, a very nice gin with a complicated taste.
